Baker's Day Cream Aerated Bakery Shortening
Baker's Day Cream Aerated Bakery Shortening is specially formulated to create light, airy baked goods with perfect volume and texture. This premium shortening is ideal for cakes, sponges, and other aerated products that require excellent aeration and stability.

Ltd., this premium oil is refined to perfection to ensure a neutral taste that allows the natural flavors of your food to shine. Nawin Gold is more than just a cooking medium; it is a healthy addition to your kitchen. Bearing the +F (Fortified) certification, it is enriched with essential vitamins to support your family's well-being.

Ltd., this high-quality Refined Palmolein oil is designed to be the versatile workhorse of your kitchen. Whether you are stir-frying fresh vegetables, preparing rich curries, or deep-frying crispy snacks, Suriya Vegetable Oil provides excellent heat stability and a neutral taste profile.

Gem Groundnut Oil

Ltd., this oil captures the nutty flavor and aroma that is essential for authentic South Indian cuisine. Groundnut oil is prized for its high smoke point and natural stability, making it an excellent choice for deep frying and sautéing.

Three Roses Pure Castor Oil
Rooted in tradition and extracted with care, Three Roses Pure Castor Oil is a premium offering from the house of SJS (Sri Jayasakthi Edible Oils Pvt. Ltd.). Sourced from high-quality castor seeds, our oil is processed to retain its natural viscosity, golden color, and healing properties. Castor oil has been a staple in Indian households for generations, known for its cooling properties and versatility.

Surya Refined Rice Bran Oil
Upgrade your kitchen with the goodness of Surya Refined Rice Bran Oil, a premium "Healthy Cooking Oil" brought to you by Sri Jayasakthi Edible Oils Pvt. Ltd. (SJS). Extracted from the nutrient-rich outer layer of rice, this oil is celebrated globally as one of the healthiest edible oils available. What sets Surya apart is its high content of Oryzanol (1000 mg), a powerful natural antioxidant known to promote heart health and manage cholesterol levels.
